Package com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.protocol_mapper

Interface IExagonProtocolMapperInbound

public interface IExagonProtocolMapperInbound
A specification for classes that represent an Exagon protocol mapper for inbound flows in the system.

Its methods are called internally by Exagon. However, for this to happen, the protocol mapper has to be registered through a IExagon.registerConnection.

Since:
5.0
See Also:
  • IExagon.registerConnection(ExagonProtocolEnum, StackConfiguration, IExagonProtocolMapperInbound)

  • Method Details

    • convertExternalRequest

      List<ExagonInternalRequest> convertExternalRequest(StackEvent externalRequest) throws BusinessException
      Converts an incoming externalRequest into a list of internal requests. This request is originated on the network.
      Parameters:
      externalRequest - the incoming external request
      Returns:
      a list with one or more incoming internal requests
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if the protocol mapper does not understand the payload inside the externalRequest
      Since:
      5.0

    • createInternalErrorReply

      StackEvent createInternalErrorReply()
      Returns static external error reply when an internal error occurs in the middle of a Saga.
      Returns:
      the outgoing external internal error reply
      Since:
      5.0
